items.name: action-001
items.desc: Make a carb-counting meal plan using my favourite restaurant's menu.
items.previewText: Planning ahead and knowing what is safe for you will make your dining experience much more enjoyable.

items.name: action-002
items.desc: On my next 3 market visits, find a new, different food I've never tried and check the label to see if it would fit into my eating plan
